title: Batman Arkham Asylum Game Of The Year Edition repack
description:
BATMAN ARKHAM ASYLUM GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION......... 

BLACKBOX REPACK.........
                                                                    
      Nothing Ripped or Removed                                              
      English Only                                                              
      Video Recoded to Lower Bitrate                                       
      Add TRIVIUM Crack                                                     
      Need At Least 1 GB Ram to Install                                       
      Need At Least 6 GB Free Space to Install                                
      Included ( DirectX & Visual Basic )               



INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Games for windows live (gfwl) is required for saving the game,, install gfwl,, 'gfwlivesetup' provided in the torrent,, run it and install gfwl,, after installation, close it,, no need to create online profile....

2.Mount the image,, run setup ,, select the necessary software from the setup(direct x       and visual c++) ,,install the game....

3.Copy all the contents of 'Crack' folder into 'Binaries' folder located in the directory where you have installed the game,, replace them over previous files....

4.When u'll launch the game using 'BmLauncher' , gfwl will ask u to create a profile, click on 'Create New Profile' and then scroll down the window and click on 'create a local profile',, enter ur name and submit,, that's it....

The game will save now and every time u'll play it will log in with this local profile,, it is applicable to every game which supports gfwl......

ENJOY AND SEED.........
